Author: axod
Content:
Why not join networks? There are several around that are free/cheap to join, and you only pay for results.
Additionally google now does CPA as well as CPC, and you can target specific websites.

Author: amichail
Content: What's the scientific evidence for its effectiveness?  In your case, it could simply be the placebo effect.

Author: bmaier
Content: OpenAds I think can be run on a per click basis, its free too I believe: http://www.openads.org/faq/general
